title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of an essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: The pros and cons of something are its advantages and disadvantages, which you consider carefully so that you can make a sensible decision.Pros and cons are only applied in argumentative essays and debate competitions supporting the both sides by providing quotations,experiences and observations in order to convince your audience whether something is beneficial or hazardous.

In the context of an argument essay, the pros are those arguments that support your thesis statement—your point of view about the subject— and the cons are arguments that counter your arguments, which you have to address so that your reader can see that you understand (and accept) that opposing views exist.
